item.description:
The Brattle Theatre in Harvard Square is showing a special engagement "Outback Gothic Sidebar" of classic Australian cinema. Tickets available online or at the theatre.

Fri, Oct 12
Wake in Fright at 8:00, 10:30 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/12/wake-in-fright/

Sat, Oct 13
Mad Max at (3:00) PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/13/mad-max/


The Road Warrior at 5:00 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/13/the-road-warrior/


Wake in Fright at 7:00, 9:30 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/13/wake-in-fright-2/

Sun, Oct 14
Walkabout at (2:30) PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/14/walkabout/


Picnic at Hanging Rock at (4:30) PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/14/picnic-at-hanging-rock/


Wake in Fright at 7:00, 9:30 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/14/picnic-at-hanging-rock/

Mon, Oct 15
Wake in Fright at 10:00 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/15/wake-in-fright-4/

Tue, Oct 16
Walkabout at 8:00 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/16/walkabout-2/


Wake in Fright at 10:00 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/16/wake-in-fright-5/

Wed, Oct 17
The Last Wave at 7:15 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/17/the-last-wave/


Wake in Fright at (4:45), 9:30 PM
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/10/17/wake-in-fright-6/

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Classic Aussie Films at the Brattle
